traits.Dwarven Resilience: The axe of mirabar soldier has advantage on saving throws against poison, and has resistance against poison damage.

actions.Multiattack: The soldier makes two battleaxe attacks. If it has a handaxe drawn, it can also make a handaxe attack.
actions.Battleaxe: Melee Weapon Attack: +5+1d4 + 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.
actions.Handaxe: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5+1d4 + 3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.
actions.Heavy Crossbow: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3+1d4 + 1 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d10 + 1) piercing damage.
